Detailed Description

Conditions object for this survey. Add rules to this object, or subclass it Each rule should return true if the page should be shown, otherwise false.

InstanceConditionFunctions::clinic ( $  session_id,
$  matchBool,
$  clinics 
)

$clinics like 1;2;99; can do this instead: %(comparisonField User.clinic_id == 1;2;3;4)

$this->log(__FUNCTION__ . "() patient's clinic (" . $patient['User']['clinic_id'] . ") MATCHED (" . $clinic . ")", LOG_DEBUG);

$this->log("clinic: patient's clinic (" . $patient['User']['clinic_id'] . ") did not match (" . $clinic . ")", LOG_DEBUG);
